trans-unit.source: The current test framework does not implement 'IGracefulStopTestExecutionCapability' which is required for '--maximum-failed-tests' feature.

trans-unit.source: Force the built-in file logger to write the log synchronously. Useful for scenario where you don't want to lose any log (i.e. in case of crash). Note that this is slowing down the test execution.
trans-unit.target: 强制内置文件记录器同步写入日志。 适用于不想丢失任何日志的情况(即在故障的情况下)。 请注意，这会减慢测试的执行速度。

trans-unit.source: Enable the diagnostic logging. The default log level is 'Trace'. The file will be written in the output directory with the name log_[yyMMddHHmmssfff].diag
trans-unit.target: 启用诊断日志记录。默认日志级别为 "Trace"。 文件将写入输出目录，名称为 log_[yyMMddHHmmssfff].diag

trans-unit.source: '--diagnostic-verbosity' expects a single level argument ('Trace', 'Debug', 'Information', 'Warning', 'Error', or 'Critical')
trans-unit.target: '--diagnostic-verbosity' 应有单一级别参数 ('Trace', 'Debug', 'Information', 'Warning', 'Error', 或 'Critical')

trans-unit.target: “--{0}”需要提供“--diagnostic”

trans-unit.source: Output directory of the diagnostic logging. If not specified the file will be generated inside the default 'TestResults' directory.
trans-unit.target: 诊断日志记录的输出目录。 如果未指定，则会在默认的 "TestResults" 目录中生成该文件。

trans-unit.source: Prefix for the log file name that will replace '[log]_.'
trans-unit.target: 将替换“[log]_”的日志文件名的前缀

trans-unit.source: Define the level of the verbosity for the --diagnostic. The available values are 'Trace', 'Debug', 'Information', 'Warning', 'Error', and 'Critical'.
trans-unit.target: 定义 --diagnostic 的详细程度。 可用值为 "Trace"、"Debug"、"Information"、"Warning"、"Error" 和 "Critical"。

trans-unit.target: 列出可用的测试。

trans-unit.target: 请勿报告特定退出代码的非成功退出值 (例如 "--ignore-exit-code 8;9" 忽略退出代码 8 和 9，在这种情况下将返回 0)

trans-unit.source: Specifies a maximum number of test failures that, when exceeded, will abort the test run.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of tests that are expected to run.
trans-unit.target: 指定预期运行的最小测试数。

trans-unit.target: "--minimum-expected-tests" 应有单个非零正整数值 (例如 "--minimum-expected-tests 10")

trans-unit.source:
Telemetry --------- Microsoft Testing Platform collects usage data in order to help us improve your experience. The data is collected by Microsoft and are not shared with anyone. You can opt-out of telemetry by setting the TESTINGPLATFORM_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT or DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your favorite shell.
Read more about Microsoft Testing Platform telemetry: https://aka.ms/testingplatform/telemetry
trans-unit.target:
遥测 --------- Microsoft 测试平台会收集使用数据，帮助我们改善体验。该数据由 Microsoft 收集，不会与任何人共享。 可通过使用喜欢的 shell 将 TESTINGPLATFORM_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 或 DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 环境变量设置为 '1' 或 'true' 来选择退出遥测。
阅读有关 Microsoft 测试平台遥测功能的详细信息: https://aka.ms/testingplatform/telemetry

trans-unit.target: 已设置遥测提供程序

trans-unit.target: 已注册测试框架功能工厂

trans-unit.source: The test framework adapter has not been registered. Use 'ITestApplicationBuilder.RegisterTestFramework' to register it
trans-unit.target: 尚未注册测试框架适配器。使用“ITestApplicationBuilder.RegisterTestFramework”注册它

trans-unit.source: Determine the result of the test application execution
trans-unit.target: 确定测试应用程序执行的结果

trans-unit.source: Test application result
trans-unit.target: 测试应用程序结果

trans-unit.source: VSTest mode only supports a single TestApplicationBuilder per process
trans-unit.target: VSTest 模式仅支持每个进程一个 TestApplicationBuilder

trans-unit.source: Discovered {0} tests in {1} assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 在 {1} 个程序集中发现了 {0} 个测试。
trans-unit.note: 0 is number of tests, 1 is count of assemblies

trans-unit.source: Discovered {0} tests.
trans-unit.target: 已发现 {0} 个测试。

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' should not have been called on this proxy object
trans-unit.target: 不应对此代理对象调用方法 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Test adapter test session failure
trans-unit.target: 测试适配器测试会话失败

trans-unit.source: Test application process didn't exit gracefully, exit code is '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 测试应用程序流程未正常退出，退出代码为“{0}”

trans-unit.source: Test run summary:
trans-unit.target: 测试运行摘要:

trans-unit.source: Failed to acquire semaphore before timeout of '{0}' seconds
trans-unit.target: 在“{0}”秒超时之前获取信号灯失败

trans-unit.source: Failed to flush logs before the timeout of '{0}' seconds
trans-unit.target: 未能在“{0}”秒超时之前刷新日志

trans-unit.source: Total
trans-unit.target: 总计

trans-unit.source: A filter '{0}' should not contain a '/' character
trans-unit.target: 筛选“{0}”不应包含“/”字符

trans-unit.source: Use a tree filter to filter down the tests to execute
trans-unit.target: 使用树筛选器筛选要执行的测试

trans-unit.source: An escape character should not terminate the filter string '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 转义字符不应终止筛选字符串“{0}”

trans-unit.source: Only the final filter path can contain '**' wildcard
trans-unit.target: 只有最终筛选路径可以包含“**”通配符

trans-unit.source: Unexpected operator '&' or '|' within filter expression '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 筛选表达式“{0}”中出现意外的运算符“&”或“|”

trans-unit.source: Invalid node path, expected root as first character '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 无效节点路径，应将根作为第一个字符“{0}”

trans-unit.source: Filter expression '{0}' contains an unbalanced number of '{1}' '{2}' operators
trans-unit.target: 筛选表达式“{0}”包含数量不平衡的“{1}”“{2}”运算符

trans-unit.source: Filter contains an unexpected '/' operator inside a parenthesized expression
trans-unit.target: 筛选在带圆括号的表达式中包含意外“/”运算符

trans-unit.source: Unexpected telemetry call, the telemetry is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 意外的遥测调用，遥测功能已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: An unexpected exception occurred during byte conversion
trans-unit.target: 字节转换期间出现意外异常

trans-unit.source: An unexpected exception occurred in 'FileLogger.WriteLogToFileAsync'. {0}
trans-unit.target: "FileLogger.WriteLogToFileAsync" 出现意外异常。 {0}

trans-unit.source: Unexpected state in file '{0}' at line '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 文件“{0}”中第“{1}”行出现意外状态

trans-unit.source: The communication protocol '{0}' is not supported
trans-unit.target: 不支持通信协议“{0}”

trans-unit.source: [ServerTestHost.OnTaskSchedulerUnobservedTaskException] Unhandled exception: {0}
trans-unit.target: [ServerTestHost.OnTaskSchedulerUnobservedTaskException] 未经处理的异常： {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} is the exception that was unhandled/unobserved

trans-unit.source: This program location is thought to be unreachable. File='{0}' Line={1}
trans-unit.target: 此程序位置被视为无法访问。文件='{0}'，行={1}

trans-unit.source: Zero tests ran
trans-unit.target: 运行了零个测试
